H0.text: Black is the color that should be painted on the can in the solar cooker to collect the most heat.

H1.text: Green is the color a class should paint the large can that they made into a solar cooker in order to collect the most heat.

H2.text: Pink is the color that a class should paint the large can used as a solar cooker in order to collect the most heat.

H3.text: White is the color that the class should paint the large can to collect the most heat when building a solar cooker.

A4.text: Pots and pans used on solar cookers should be matte black in color to maximize absorption.

A5.text: Cooking containers and the inside bottom of the cooker should be dark-colored or black.
